about.title: About Me
about.text: Results-driven project manager with hands-on experience leading Data & AI initiatives in both the public and private sectors. Specialized in digital transformation strategy, Generative AI project scoping, and regulatory compliance. Proven ability to coordinate multidisciplinary teams, align stakeholders across complex ecosystems, and deliver measurable outcomes using Agile and governance frameworks. Bilingual French-English with international experience across France, French Polynesia, Tahiti, and New Zealand.

bullets: Mapped 30+ key stakeholders (DGEN, OPT, ISPs) via Stakeholder Mapping, aligning public/private roadmaps for the structuring of the Audiovisual & Digital sectors
Served as liaison between government leadership and DGEN, translating 3 major public policy pillars into a co-constructed operational roadmap executable by technical services
Conducted regulatory impact analysis on 2 public infrastructure projects via a Risk Matrix, identifying 10 critical legal and technical watchpoints before launching tenders
Prioritized DGEN intervention zones for digital divide reduction using a multi-criteria Decision Matrix, targeting 2 priority white zones for the following 12 months
Drafted strategic notes and policy recommendations for the adoption of digital and audiovisual technology projects
Reviewed and processed institutional files across the digital and audiovisual portfolios
Structured collaboration of a 10-person cross-functional team (Data Scientists, Developers, Data Engineers) using a RACI Matrix, reducing decision-making latency by 15% during the POC scoping phase
Scoped and arbitrated 2 Generative AI Proofs of Concept (POCs) using the MoSCoW method, isolating critical "Must Have" features to deliver a testable product in under 4 months
Led "Green AI Watch" workshops and measured team adoption via a quantitative feedback grid, achieving a 90% satisfaction rate across technical and business teams
Designed product visuals and packaging labels for retail and laboratory lines
Led commercial prospecting efforts and managed client advisory and point-of-sale transactions
Created DIP (Document d'Information Prealable) documentation for laboratory and retail operations
Translated commercial brochures from French to English for international outreach
Developed strategic communication plans for regional banking products
Created product and educational visual materials; managed welcome kit design updates
Conducted market analysis on neobanks and online banking competitors
Designed product visual materials and brand communication assets
Managed sponsoring and logistics for the annual corporate teambuilding event

degrees.degree: Master in Management PGE / MSc Artificial Intelligence for Business Transformation (AIBT)

items.name: Digital Strategy & Stakeholder Ecosystem Alignment
items.description: Participated in building a comprehensive stakeholder map of 30+ public and private actors to align roadmaps for the digital and audiovisual sectors of French Polynesia. Contributed to bridging public policy objectives with operational execution plans.

items.name: Generative AI POC Delivery (x2)
items.description: Scoped and delivered 2 Generative AI Proofs of Concept within a major French banking institution. Applied MoSCoW prioritization to isolate critical features and ensure testable deliverables within a 4-month timeline.

items.name: Regulatory Risk Assessment for Public Digital Infrastructure
items.description: Performed regulatory impact analysis on 2 public infrastructure projects using a formal Risk Matrix methodology, identifying 10 legal and technical risk points ahead of public tenders.

items.name: Digital Divide Reduction - Territorial Prioritization
items.description: Designed and applied a multi-criteria Decision Matrix to prioritize intervention zones, enabling targeted action on 2 white zones for broadband access over a 12-month plan.

items.name: Green AI Watch Program
items.description: Designed and facilitated internal workshops on responsible and sustainable AI practices. Implemented a quantitative feedback system that recorded a 90% satisfaction rate from technical and business participants.

items.name: Elements of AI - AI & Ethics
items.description: Understanding of algorithms, Machine Learning and neural networks. Focus on AI Ethics, algorithmic bias and societal impacts.

items.name: L'Atelier RGPD - Data Protection
items.description: Mastery of the legal framework (GDPR), rights of individuals and obligations of actors. Compliance management, Accountability and data security.
